item.title: Citing autopen use, GOP-led House Oversight Committee calls Biden actions ‘illegitimate’
item.description: A report released Tuesday calls for further DOJ investigation into the Biden administration.

item.title: Texas AG Paxton files Tylenol lawsuit, taking cues from Trump, Kennedy
item.description: Texas Attorney General Ken Paxton, a Republican seeking election to the U.S. Senate, filed suit against Tylenol’s maker and its former parent company ...

item.title: Japan’s new leader tries to charm Trump with gold, golf and deal on rare minerals
item.description: Japanese Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi and President Donald Trump inked a rare-earth minerals deal ahead of Trump’s meeting with China’s Xi Jinping.

item.title: Callers to Social Security wait for hours to get help. Hear their ordeals.
item.description: Millions of seniors and disabled people call Social Security’s 1-800 number every month. What they experience is often maddening.

item.title: The story behind that surprisingly catchy Social Security hold music
item.description: This musician wrote a song nearly 20 years ago about not waiting. Hundreds of millions have heard it -- while on hold, waiting.
